subject: Delivery address
description_text:
Good evening,

My house name is missing from the shipping address and needs to be amended.
At the moment, it's only displaying my street address not the actual
address. Could you please correct this and change address my house name
which is Dolwar.

Kind regards,

George Estep.

conversations.body_text: Hi George Estep,    Okay, I've made the changes for you. Please confirm.  George Estep  Moreton Road  Dolwar  Holyhead  LL65 2BG  United Kingdom  +44 7887 351683
